headline: Verizon and Paige Bueckers team up for an exclusive youth basketball experience to empower the next generation of DFW athletes
summary: What you need to know: Verizon is launching a sweepstakes to give youth, ages 13-17, a chance to win a spot at an exclusive basketball experience with Paige Bueckers. Sweepstakes runs from August 8 to August 17. The experience with Paige will take place on August 25 in Dallas. DALLAS, Aug. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon is launching a sweepstakes to offer young basketball enthusiasts, ages 13-17, the opportunity to participate in an exclusive youth basketball experience with women’s basket

headline: Telecomm ETFs in Focus After VZ & T's Q2 Earnings Beat
summary: VZ and T beat earnings estimates. Also, powered by AI optimism and rate-cut hopes, the sector is poised for a rally. One can try ETFs like XTL and IYZ.
